item.title: ASML shares jump as surge in orders defies fears of DeepSeek hitting AI chip demand
item.description: Dutch semiconductor equipment maker ASML on Wednesday reported better-than-expected net sales and profit results for the fourth quarter.

item.title: World’s largest sovereign wealth fund reports record $222 billion annual profit on tech rally
item.description: Norway’s sovereign wealth fund reported its full-year earnings on Wednesday.

item.title: World's largest luxury group LVMH posts better than feared full-year sales
item.description: The world's largest luxury company LVMH on Tuesday reported better-than-expected full-year sales, in the strongest sign yet of a potential turnaround ...

item.title: We're increasing our price target on Starbucks after CEO Brian Niccol shows signs of progress
item.description: The coffee giant is in the midst of a turnaround. Patience is required.

item.title: Shares of Nextracker soar on stellar earnings. What we need to see before upgrading the stock
item.description: Shares jumped more than 16% in extended trading after better-than-expected results and raised guidance.
